backend/main.mo: Main backend actor handling blob storage, access control, user approvals, profiles, file/folder metadata, and role-restricted admin operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the file search fix to affected frontend files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point bootstrapping the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component managing authentication, access checks, profile setup, and conditional rendering of file management UI.
frontend/src/components/AccessDenied.tsx: Pending-approval screen showing user's principal ID with copy functionality and instructions.
Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/FileList.tsx: File and folder management UI with search, navigation, uploads, deletion, previews, and full-path search result handling.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewModal: Modal component that loads and previews images, videos, audio, documents, and text files with navigation, fullscreen, and download support.
frontend/src/components/FileUpload.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a file upload component.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright text and a link with an icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar handling authentication, theme toggle, user info display, and admin panel access.
frontend/src/components/ManagePanel.tsx: Admin panel modal for managing members, roles, and storage stats with add/remove actions.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: User profile setup form that validates username uniqueness and saves the profile.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Button that switches between light and dark themes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor based on the current identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user auth, access checks, profile actions, file listing, and search, all backed by an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base file defining theme variables, dark mode variants, and global styling.
frontend/src/lib/canisterIds.ts: Resolves backend and frontend canister IDs from env variables, window, URL, or fallbacks.
frontend/src/lib/fileTypes.ts: Utility functions for parsing file extensions, determining MIME types, and identifying previewable file categories.
frontend/src/lib/search.ts: Provides caseâ€‘insensitive search term normalization and simple substring matching.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entrypoint setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, radii, and registering plugins.
project_state.json: JSON describing project state, pending feature requests, and notes related to file search fixes and version updates.
